definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: I'll just consider their theoretical arguments in broad strokes.
sentences.chinese: 我僅細想了他們大致框架裏的理論爭論。

sentences.english: In my experience the Adaptive and Exploratory approaches are one in the same.
sentences.chinese: 根據我的經驗，自適應式和探索式的方法大致相同。

sentences.english: In the abstract sense, events are real-world things that happen.
sentences.chinese: 大致說來，事件是真實世界中發生的那些事。

sentences.english: Basically it lasts until it's gone full circle and has been returned back to the temple where it started.
sentences.chinese: 大致上，它要走完整個路程，回到作爲起點的佛牙寺。

sentences.english: To a first approximation, the non-economist's answers violate fundamental economic logic.
sentences.chinese: 大致上，非經濟學家的答案違反了基本的經濟邏輯。

sentences.english: The amount of solar energy hitting its high-latitude location is now roughly the same as it was when it shut down.
sentences.chinese: 如今到達高緯度地區的太陽能與其關閉時的大致相當。

sentences.english: The play the causes and effects of logical relationship is roughly such.
sentences.chinese: 這齣戲的前因後果邏輯關係大致是這樣的。

sentences.english: That is roughly what will be deducted automatically from your account over the year.
sentences.chinese: 這大致就是每年自動從你帳戶中扣除的金額。

sentences.english: Chop peanuts, or crush them with the side of a knife, or pulse them in a food processor to chop roughly.
sentences.chinese: 碎掉的花生或是用刀柄將他們押碎，大致弄碎就是了。

sentences.english: Telophase is roughly the reverse of prophase.
sentences.chinese: 末期大致是早期的逆向。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, he was looking out along the Ecliptic, in that general direction.
sentences.chinese: 但無論如何，它正在沿黃道面朝那個大致方向望出去。

sentences.english: This is roughly half of the current level of consumption perhead.
sentences.chinese: 這大致是目前人均消費水平的一半。

sentences.english: GDP has lurched sickeningly downward, but employment has not.
sentences.chinese: 國內生產總值急劇下滑，但就業率還算大致穩定。

sentences.english: The student body is generally very engaged in politics or different events and causes
sentences.chinese: 學生們大致上都積極參與政治事務，以及其他的活動。

sentences.english: Roughly speaking, there are four steps to every decision. First, you perceive a situation.
sentences.chinese: 大致說來，做出一個決定要經歷四個步驟。

sentences.english: We defined the existence of the underground palace and its location.
sentences.chinese: 據此亦明確了地宮的大致位置。

definition: in general/more or less/in rough terms/basically/on the whole/overall situation/the big picture/(Tw) remains (of a dead person)
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
